title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Patient-reported outcomes improved data collection efficiency by 40% in kidney cancer trials.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate mobile app with AI reminders to enhance completion rates.
